protein.general_function: Involved in calcium-dependent cysteine-type endopeptidase activity
protein.specific_function: Calcium-regulated non-lysosomal thiol-protease which catalyze limited proteolysis of substrates involved in cytoskeletal remodeling and signal transduction

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides
